title: Jalapeño Poppers with Taqueritos Chile Toreado
instructions: Step 1: Mix the cream cheese, garlic, onion, paprika, salt and Worcestershire sauce in a container.
Step 2: Fill the jalapenos with the mixture.
Step 3: Beat the egg in a separate bowl and coat the jalapeño in flour and then egg.
Step 4: Crush the Taqueritos Chile Toreado.
Step 5: Coat each jalapeño with the crushed Taqueritos. In a frying pan, heat enough oil and fry the jalapenos until golden.
Step 6: Serve and enjoy with your favorite sauce.
